Change Editors==>code page to UTF-8.

Cannot recreate if I start from scratch with the above steps.  I have the 
workspace if you want.  When trying to recreate I turned off autobuild, 
imported the plugins except org.eclipse.ui.  Loaded org.eclipse.ui from the 
repository.  Changed code page to utf-8. Turned auto build back on and I had a 
bunch of compile errors.  I couldn't successfully compile until put the cp back 
to 1255.  Then when I switched to utf-8 and tried the open type, it worked.
Lynne, could you please provide us with the workspace?

Failure seems to be occurring in the JCL, due to some issue using encoding. 
Only possible bug on our side would be to use the wrong encoding.

Jerome - you may want to provide a patch for tracing the encoding used when 
accessing the file. Lyne could then give it a try.
Received the workspace from Lynne. Investigating...

I cannot reproduce on my machine. Lynne, could you please give a try to the 
patch I'm going to send you and that is tracing the encoding calls?
I'm on Win2K with Hebrew installed.  Perhaps that is related.

Moving to Platform/Core as this sound like a problem with the string returned 
by ResourcesPlugin.getEncoding() (this is the only call we do to get the 
encoding) and we don't have Hebrew installed here in SNZ.
